title: Danefæ
overview: Danefæ follows archaeologist couple Ester and Michael Toksvig as their marriage and careers collide. While Michael leads a major national museum exhibition, Ester works at a small Viking museum and discovers a thousand-year-old murder that could rewrite Danish history. As ambition and betrayal surface, Ester fights to uncover the truth and reclaim her voice in both history and her own life.
